title: Rule-Based Scientific Inquiry Projects for Conceptual Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Learners utilize digital resources on personal devices and collaborate in small groups of 4–5 members to complete projects.

learning_goals: Learners identify rules explaining core features of given science concepts with 90% accuracy.
Learners distinguish the scope of concept application by comparing examples and non-examples with 85% accuracy.
Learners complete projects applying learned concepts to new situations with 80% fidelity.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
